thread.title: Rising Vacations recensione scritta da Donna
thread.title_full: Rising Vacations recensione scritta da Donna

author: Donna
title: Rising Vacations recensione scritta da Donna
text: We traveled on the west coast from Kenmare to Galway. Everything arranged by Simone was topnotch. We had drivers from one town to the next and all were knowledgeable about the area and willing to stop whenever we wanted to stop. All three b and b's were perfect in their own way: Shelburne Lodge, Coastline and Petra House. I trusted Simone because of the wonderful trip that Rising Vacations had planned for us three years ago.
